CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 5, 1954, page 1, reads: "...Courier's gala third annual Home Service Fair slated for Hunt Armory June 10,11 and 12..."
TitMainTitle: Man and woman holding box of silverware, standing in front of stage with Jessie Vann and Mal Goode, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Vann, Jessie, 1889-1967.Goode, Mal, 1908-1995.
